sections.title: Training Programs
sections.description: Custom workouts to match your lifestyle

items.name: Personal Training
items.description: One-on-one coaching built around your goals with weekly progress tracking.
details: Movement assessment and goal planning to map your training blocks
Custom strength, conditioning, and mobility sessions refreshed every 4 weeks
Accountability with check-ins, form review, and adjustments between sessions

items.name: Group Classes
items.description: High-energy classes focused on strength, conditioning, and teamwork.
details: Small groups so coaches can correct form and pacing for every athlete
Balanced weekly schedule for power, conditioning, and mobility
Scalable movements so beginners and advanced athletes can train together

items.name: Nutrition Coaching
items.description: Habit-first nutrition guidance to fuel training and recovery.
details: Macro targets aligned to your sport, sleep, and stress profile
Meal plans with grocery guides and simple prep options
Weekly check-ins with data review and habit adjustments

sections.title: Why Choose Us
sections.description: We combine science and empathy to deliver the best results.
